parser.symbolTable

Class Scope

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.symbolTable.Scope

  • public class Scope
extends java.lang.Object
    Scope class. Used as the symbol table and in RECORDs.
    Author:
    tuvialerea

        Constructor for a Scope.

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        public Entry insert(java.lang.String identifier,
                    Entry value)
        Inserts a new mapping of identifier to value.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The string identifier
        value - the entry value it should map too.
        Returns:
        the value inserted

      • find

        public Entry find(java.lang.String identifier)
        Finds the given identifier in the scope. If not found will recurse to the outer scope if it exists.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier to search for.
        Returns:
        the Entry that identifier maps to. null if not found

      • local

        public boolean local(java.lang.String identifier)
        Checks to see if the given identifier has a mapping in the scope.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier to search for.
        Returns:
        true if found, false if not

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a debugging string representation of the scope.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

        Function to get the outer scope.

        Parameters:
        outer - the scope to set to.

        Parameters:
        v - the visitor to visit

      • getEntries

        public java.util.SortedSet<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,Entry>> getEntries()
        Function to get an ordered set of all entries in the scope. Sorted by key.
        Returns:
        A SortedSet of all scope entries.
